content:
# The error indicates that I no longer have any Iron Ore left in my inventory to insert into the Stone Furnace for smelting.
# I need to go back and harvest more Iron Ore before I can proceed with smelting.

# Let's locate the nearest Iron Ore resource again and move there to harvest more.
iron_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_position)  # Move to the nearest Iron Ore patch.
